page.title: 02My Dad Works As .......
page.content: My dad is a lecturer in Technical Drawing and Engineering at the Soundwell Technical College,Bristol. It is a round journey of about sixty miles but he does not mind this.The college has up to date equipment and modern buildings.Sometimes he has to work in the evenings.In his spare time he is a photographer. My dad works in a Watts Tyre factory in Lydney.It makes tyres and false bottoms for containers.His job is making bottoms for gas cylinders.It is very hot there because of an incinerator used to melt polyurethene. My dad works as a self-employed firm called Severnside Damproofing.He goes around giving buildings protection against damp and also does woodworm treatment.He travels and carries his equipment in a van.
